name: Bacche
wishText: I wish you all smiles, happiness, love success and all good things in life. Aur agar itni wishes ke baad bhi kch problem aye, toh I wish you have all the courage to face it and resolve it. CA Akanksha Garg ;)
text1: I wanted just to say HBD, but
textInChatBox: what's so special about today in 2024?
text2: July 19: Today is YOUR birthday! I just can't say HBD...
text4: Nhi samaj aa rha aur kya likhu, because I'm nervous, but I wanted to make you feel
outroText: Okay, ab rona mat and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
